title: Laser-Computer font?
content:
I'm affraid I've got only a little logo to try to identify this font. I've tried some font capture/recognize soft, but none of them have found a solution. It seems the most similar font is a Laser Disco.

Any guess? Thanks!
author: javipas

comments.content:
[[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/rebel-train-goes/|Rebel Train Goes]] is closer but still no cigar.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---
Mmm, seems a little more similar that what I had found, but yes, still no cigar. Thx...
